major: Bachelor’s Degree in Business Information Technology, Game Development, full-time
description: The Bachelor’s Degree in Business Information Technology at Kajaani University of Applied Sciences offers you an extensive education in the field of game development. During the studies, you can choose to specialize in game programming, game art/graphics or producing games.

major: Bachelor’s Degree in Esports Business, full-time
description: Kajaani University of Applied Sciences provides its students with invaluable hands-on experience within the rapidly growing esports industry. The ‘Esports Business’ degree program delves into the various components that propel the business side of one of the world’s fastest-growing sports.

major: Degree in Information Technology, Software Development in the Age of AI, capital region, part-time
description: Software Development in the Age of AI is a cutting-edge, part-time engineering program designed to equip students with the skills and knowledge to excel in the rapidly evolving field of software development. This program merges traditional software engineering principles with modern AI techniques, providing a comprehensive education that prepares students to design, develop, and deploy intelligent software systems.

The International Business degree at KAMK develops the necessary skills and competencies for positions requiring business expertise in today’s global and multicultural working life. The studies emphasize applying the learned theories into practice.

Nurses play a crucial role in promoting health, preventing diseases, and providing rehabilitative care. During your Bachelor of Health Care studies, you will acquire the skills needed to plan, assess, and enhance nursing care. The curriculum includes core and professional studies, clinical training, and a bachelor’s thesis.

major: Bachelor’s Degree in Sports Coaching and Business Management, full-time
description: Are you a team player with passion for sports? The fully English-taught Sports Coaching and Business Management degree at KAMK is a unique degree in Finland. We offer you a versatile degree that develops your professional skillset and competences in sports and exercise instruction, coaching and smart training as well as in business and management.

During the studies, you will gain a comprehensive overview of the different aspects of the tourism industry, such as accommodation, catering and program services and event management. You will study the current trends and phenomena in the tourism industry and build a strong competence base for multidisciplinary collaboration in the tourism operational environments.

major: Bachelor’s Degree in Tourism, part-time, Helsinki
description: During the studies, you will gain a comprehensive overview of the different aspects of the tourism industry, such as accommodation, catering and program services and event management. You will study the current trends and phenomena in the tourism industry and build a strong competence base for multidisciplinary collaboration in the tourism operational environments.

major: Master’s Degree in Game Business Management (Engineering), part-time
description: The Master of Engineering Degree in Game Business Management is aimed at engineers working or seeking employment in growth and internationalization-oriented game development organizations.

major: Master’s Degree in Game Business Management, part-time
description: Are you in the gaming industry and thinking about advancing your career? Introducing our Master’s Degree in Game Business Management, designed for professionals in the gaming world.

major: Master’s Degree in Global Business Management, full-time
description: The Master´s Degree in Global Business Management at Kajaani University of Applied Sciences will help you on your journey towards achieving a management position, developing a strong professional network, or even starting your own business.

major: Master’s Degree in International Business Management, part-time, online
description: The Master´s Degree in International Business Management is aimed at staff of growth and internationalization oriented organisations, or organisations that already engage in international operations or at persons seeking employment in such organisations.
